word_mean: 错觉，幻觉，假象：错的或误解了的感觉印象，或对真实的感觉影象理解错误

sentence.Network_en: Sloping walls on the bulk of the building create an optical illusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 大楼主体的斜墙给人造成一种视错觉。

sentence.Network_en: She laboured under the illusion that I knew what I was doing.
sentence.Network_cn: 她有一个错觉，以为我知道自己在做什么。

sentence.Network_en: This eerie calm is an illusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种怪诞的平静是一种假象。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... collusion n 同谋；勾结 illusion n 错觉，幻觉 ludicrous a 滑稽的，可笑的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... collusion n 同谋；勾结 illusion n 错觉，幻觉 ludicrous a 滑稽的，可笑的.
一段情两颗❤ 三个字 。 ... 388. hostile a. 敌视的 389. illusion n. 幻想 390. imaginary a. 虚构的.
舞台英文术语 ... snow bag 雪袋 illusion 假象 light curtain 光帘.

list.abs: 大体上，视觉错觉（Visual Illusion）大致可以分成底下几类：视觉错觉：蜡烛竟然站立起来了视觉错觉：大小错觉，这个可能会让你 …
货币幻觉（Money Illusion）的存在对经济景气背景下的个人理财策略提出了纠偏要求。因为物价水平随着经济增长而持续大幅上涨， …
错视（Optical illusion），又称视觉假象（Visual illusion）是指通过几何排列、视觉成像规律等手段，制作有视觉欺骗成分的图像进行 …
庞佐错觉（Ponzo Illusion）：中间的四边形是矩形，而不是顶边比底边宽的四角形。 厄任斯坦错觉（Ebrenstein Illusion）：中间矩形 …

lj.lj_ly: the world is under the illusion that the original painting still hangs in the Winter Palace.
lj.lj_ls: 全世界的人都错误地认为原画还挂在冬宫内。

jx.jx_en_mean: be fully aware of the true state of affairs

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'deceiving, deception'): via Old French from Latin illusio(n-), from illudere 'to mock', from in- 'against' + ludere 'play'

encyclopedia.content: illusion，日本3DHGAME界的元老级公司，在这个领域一直引领技术的潮流。illusion是日本的一家知名十八禁3D游戏制作公司，主要作品有尾行系列、欲望格斗系列、欲望血液系列、人工少女系列及性感沙滩系列等。

entry.def: An illusion is a false idea or belief.

example.ex: Do not have any illusions that an industrial tribunal will right all employment wrongs...
example.tran: 不要幻想一个劳资仲裁法庭能纠正所有的雇佣不公现象。

example.ex: No one really has any illusions about winning the war.
example.tran: 没有人幻想能赢得这场战争。

entry.def: An illusion is something that appears to exist or be a particular thing but does not actually exist or is in reality something else.

example.ex: Floor-to-ceiling windows can give the illusion of extra height...
example.tran: 从地板直抵天花板的窗子会给人以高出实际距离的幻觉。

example.ex: This eerie calm is an illusion.
example.tran: 这种怪诞的平静是一种假象。

means.word_mean: 2. something many people believe that is false;

sentences.sentence: "they have the illusion that I am very wealthy"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of deluding; deception by creating illusory ideas
4. an illusory feat; considered magical by naive observers

auth_sentence.content: But expansion of the universe may be an illusion.
auth_sentence.res_content: But expansion of the universe may be an illusion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But expansion of the universe may be an illusion.

auth_sentence.content: I don't understand how this is an illusion?
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't understand how this is an illusion?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't understand how this is an illusion?

auth_sentence.content: Same illusion of protection and safety, I bet.
auth_sentence.res_content: Same illusion of protection and safety, I bet.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Same illusion of protection and safety, I bet.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"使……,成为,进入,再"; 2. 放在同辅音词根前表示"不,无"

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不,无+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
il不,无+liberal宽大的→adj.气量狭窄的,吝啬的
il不,无+licit合法的, 正当的→adj.违法的,违禁的
il不,无+literate有文化的→adj.不识字的
il不,无+logical逻辑的→adj.不合逻辑的
il使……,成为,进入,再+lus玩弄+ion表名词→被[幻觉]玩弄→幻觉
il使……,成为,进入,再+lumin光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明
il使……,成为,进入,再+lustr=lust光+ate表动词→使…光明→说明

Sentence.sentence: But this premise turns out to be an illusion.

means.word_mean: 错觉, 幻想, 错误观念

sentences.en: The sun appears to go round the Earth, but it's an illu -sion.
sentences.cn: 太阳看起来好像绕着地球转, 但这只是个错觉。

sentences.en: The mirrors all round the walls give an illusion of greater space.
sentences.cn: 墙壁周围的镜子造成一种较大空间的假象。

jushi.english: The mirrors all around the walls give an illusion of greater space.
jushi.chinese: 墙壁周围的镜子造成一种较大空间的假象。

jushi.english: The sun appears to go around the Earth, but this is an illusion.
jushi.chinese: 太阳看起来好像绕着地球转,但这只是个错觉。

jushi.english: He cherished the illusion that she loved him, but he was wrong.
jushi.chinese: 他抱有她爱他的错觉,但他错了。
